question: I want to become an Alim.
answer:
QUESTION
I want to become an Alim, but I?m not financially stable, nor I have legal status in the U.S. so I can attend a prestigious Islamic University in India, Pakistan , South Africa etc. I want to be an Alim really badly. Can you offer me some Wazifa so I can over come my obstacle, and Allah will open the ways for me.
ANSWER


Share:
We suggest you continue making Du'aa unto Allah Ta'ala. Du'aa is more potent
than Wazeefas, etc.

If you wish to pursue Islamic studies in South Africa, we may be able to
help you. Kindly contact us once you have made your decision.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Muhammad Kadwa
FATWA DEPT.

CHECKED AND APPROVED: Moulana Imraan Vawda
